changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE resume ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), military_duty VARCHAR(255), education VARCHAR(255), metro_station VARCHAR(255), good_qualities VARCHAR(2000), bad_qualities VARCHAR(2000), bad_habits VARCHAR(2000), reasons_for_working VARCHAR(2000), good_job_qualities VARCHAR(2000), busyness VARCHAR(2000), resume_src VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) );
